alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 8:30AM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT EST /11 PM CST/ TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST /8 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 18 degrees. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 15 degrees. * WHERE...Inland Bay, Calhoun and Gadsden Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight EST /11 PM CST/ tonight to 9 AM EST /8 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
